trans-unit.source: A collection that stores <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> objects.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection> class represents the collection of all the styles used to describe the rows in an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>.
Adds a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection.Add%2A> method reapplies the table layout to all the controls in the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> container.
The number of styles stored in a collection is limited only by available memory.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref>.
The position into which the new element was inserted.
Determines whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref> contains a specific style.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref>.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> is found in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Determines the index of a specific item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection.IndexOf%2A> method begins searching at the first element of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection> and ends either when it finds a match or it reaches the last element.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref>.
The index of rowStyle if found in the ; otherwise, -1.
Inserts a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> into the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref> at the specified position.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection.Insert%2A> method reapplies the table layout to all the controls in the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> container.
The number of styles stored in a collection is limited only by available memory.

In collections of contiguous elements, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection> class, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the inserted element.
The indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
The zero-based index at which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> should be inserted.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> to insert into the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref>.
The value can be `null`.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> to get or set.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> at the specified index.
Removes the first occurrence of a specific object from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection.Remove%2A> method reapplies the table layout to all the controls in the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> container.
In collections of contiguous elements, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection> class, the elements that follow the deletion point move up to occupy the vacated spot.
The indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection"></xref>.
The value can be `null`.
